# About

Aggregation report.

# Exposures

## Table

```{r}
exposures_table_file_name <- list.files(path = params$aggregate_output_dir, pattern = "_exposures.tsv")
exposures_table_full_path <- paste(params$aggregate_output_dir, exposures_table_file_name, sep="/")
exposures_table <- read.table(exposures_table_full_path, header = T, sep = "\t")
DTable(exposures_table)
```

## Plot

```{r, include = FALSE}
exposures_pdf_file_name <- list.files(path = params$aggregate_output_dir, pattern = "_exposures.pdf")
exposures_pdf_full_path <- paste(params$aggregate_output_dir, exposures_pdf_file_name, sep="/")
knitr::include_graphics(exposures_pdf_full_path)
```
